items.content_html: React-hl-audio is a lightweight, headless React library for easy and flexible management of HTML5 audio elements, without prescribing UI design.

items.content_html: ClipX.js is a lightweight JavaScript library for efficient clipboard management, text manipulation, and user feedback. It offers simple copy, cut, and paste operations, basic text formatting, and built-in toast notifications with customizable messages, all in a compact package.
items.title: MrAkshayAS/clipx: ClipX.js is a lightweight JavaScript library for efficient clipboard management, text manipulation, and user feedback. It offers simple copy, cut, and paste operations, basic text formatting, and built-in toast notifications with customizable messages, all in a compact package.

items.content_html: A lightweight JavaScript plugin that automatically inserts invisible breaks between Chinese and English characters to improve text readability in mixed-language content. Perfect for web pages that feature CJK (Chinese, Japanese, Korean) and English text, ensuring a clean and user-friendly layout.

Perfect for web pages that feature CJK (Chinese, Japanese, Korean) and English text, ensuring a clean and user-friendly layout.
